schema:creator: Long, J.D.
schema:description: All erected of adobe brick by Mr. Cretol, an artisan of Shafter. ([a](/collection/ag_eng/AR-012/AR_012_1845a)) Office and cottage, ([b](/collection/ag_eng/AR-012/AR_012_1845b)) laborers cottage, ([c](/collection/ag_eng/AR-012/AR_012_1845c)) One room "bunk house," with wash room and shower at right. Note lattice work above latter.
